criteria: Performance benchmark test (TASK-DTE-005) must pass. All Jint sandbox constraint tests must pass. Code coverage for security-related code > 90%. Successful security review of DPAPI implementation.
success_metrics: Zero critical security findings. Performance target met.

criteria: E2E tests for script editor and preview functionality must pass. All API endpoints must be documented in OpenAPI. No critical accessibility issues found in UI components.
success_metrics: Core admin user flow is functional and intuitive.

gate_name: Sprint 3 Quality Gate: Compliance & Change Management
criteria: Successful security review of the audit log immutability design. Integration tests for transactional integrity of versioning logic must pass. All specified events are logged to the audit trail.
success_metrics: Audit trail design is approved for SOC 2 / ISO 27001 objectives.

criteria: E2E tests for UI versioning features (diff, revert) must pass. Prometheus metrics are correctly generated and scraped. Data size and schema validation rules are successfully enforced in integration tests.
success_metrics: All new features are functional and meet acceptance criteria.

criteria: All user-facing documentation is complete and reviewed. Migration script is tested and documented. Feature flag functionality is verified end-to-end. Final regression testing is complete.
success_metrics: Feature is ready for a controlled production release.
